title: Calculate Customer Lifetime Value (CLV)
description: A marketing analyst wants to calculate the lifetime value of a specific customer.

tasks.description: Retrieve all past orders for a given customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a complete list of the customer's orders.

tasks.description: Sum the total value of all their orders.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the total revenue from the customer.

tasks.description: Optionally, apply a formula to estimate future value based on purchase frequency and average order value.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an estimated Customer Lifetime Value.
